mapper.select: SELECT b.pmname AS zpmname,c.lpname AS zlpname,d.pname AS zpname,a.* FROM manufacturer AS a LEFT JOIN payment_method AS b ON a.pmid=b.pmid LEFT JOIN level_producers AS c ON a.lpid=c.lpid LEFT JOIN place_origin AS d ON a.pid=d.pid

SELECT b.pmname AS zpmname,c.lpname AS zlpname,d.pname AS zpname,a.* FROM manufacturer AS a LEFT JOIN payment_method AS b ON a.pmid=b.pmid LEFT JOIN level_producers AS c ON a.lpid=c.lpid LEFT JOIN place_origin AS d ON a.pid=d.pid WHERE a.pid=#{pid}

SELECT b.pmname AS zpmname,c.lpname AS zlpname,d.pname AS zpname,a.* FROM manufacturer AS a LEFT JOIN payment_method AS b ON a.pmid=b.pmid LEFT JOIN level_producers AS c ON a.lpid=c.lpid LEFT JOIN place_origin AS d ON a.pid=d.pid WHERE a.`mfid`= #{name} OR a.`mfname` LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{name},'%') or a.mftellphone = #{name}

SELECT b.linkno AS zlinkno,b.mfid AS zmfid,b.linkname AS zlinkname, b.phone AS zphone,b.linkphone AS zlinkphone,b.linkemail AS zlinkemail, b.position AS zposition ,a.* FROM manufacturer AS a LEFT JOIN linkman AS b ON a.mfid=b.mfid WHERE a.mfid=#{mfid}
mapper.sql: mfid, mfname, mfaddress, mfsituation, mfwebsite, mfopeningbank, mfbankaccount, pmid, lpid, mfmanagementbrand, pid, mfcontacts, mfphone, mfemail, mftellphone, mfaccount, mfremark, remark1, remark2, remark3, remark4, remark5
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from manufacturer
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into manufacturer (mfid, mfname, mfaddress, mfsituation, mfwebsite, mfopeningbank, mfbankaccount, pmid, lpid, mfmanagementbrand, pid, mfcontacts, mfphone, mfemail, mftellphone, mfaccount, mfremark, remark1, remark2, remark3, remark4, remark5) values (#{mfid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mfname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mfaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mfsituation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mfwebsite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mfopeningbank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mfbankaccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lpid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mfmanagementbrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mfcontacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mfphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mfemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mftellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mfaccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mfremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mfname,
